Technique: FORMED BY HAND; WRITTEN WITH A REED PEN/REED WITH SPLIT NIB
Name: Coptic ostracon
Description: This Coptic ostracon, which was purchased by J. Capart at Dra Abu el Naga in 1900, contains a letter concerning the settlement of a debt. A certain Kyrikos writes to Thello and her husband Isaac to pay the sum due to Pmai, to whom he himself owes money.
